name: TheSound
aliases: Play a Song - Save a Dog
description: Giving away copyright-free music for use on social media to raise money for dog rescue.

SDGs.evidenceText: We operate an animal rescue and have a free-neutering service for dogs.
We are building a sanctuary community using sustainable agriculture..
We support the poor elderly with a food bank.
We give away music for use on socila media and the social media system pay a small royalty per play of each song.
We have a "no-burn" trash policy and will buy an electric truck in 2022
We grow food for our food bank.
We allocate 75% of our resources to help women.
